Title: QR Code for C#
HomeWiki:
Project Description
QR Code encoder library

Hi, I moved repository to Github https://github.com/consulgo/QrCode4cs. Repository on CodePlex is not maintained anymore.
Over there I fixed a few code issues and added sample WPF application.

It is simple library for the encoding of the qr codes (qrcode4cs uses only System and System.Collections.Generic). It is a translation of the QRCode for JavaScript https://github.com/jeromeetienne/jquery-qrcode/. Special thanks to Jerome Etienne for a blog post: http://notes.jetienne.com/2011/04/07/jquery-qrcode.html.
